Package org.dom4j.io.aelfred

The default SAX XMLReader implementation which is a port of the original Aelfred SAX Parser.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
DefaultHandler This class extends the SAX base handler class to support the SAX2 Lexical and Declaration handlers.
SAXDriver An enhanced SAX2 version of Microstar's Ælfred XML parser.
 

Package org.dom4j.io.aelfred Description

The default SAX XMLReader implementation which is a port of the original Aelfred SAX Parser. It is taken from Michael Kay's distribution of David Brownell's SAX2 port of Microstar Software Ltd's original Aelfred SAX Parser.
